channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260128)
item.description:
What's New

fix: Spotlight/overlay apps input & navigation keys handling

  • Skip cursor movement detection for overlay apps (Spotlight, Raycast, Alfred)

to prevent engine reset after each keystroke

  • Add handlers for Arrow Up/Down, Home, End, Page Up/Page Down keys

to commit composition before cursor movement

  • Update build version to 20260128

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
